channel.title: git on Timo's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in git on Timo's Blog

item.title: Git Rebase vs. Merge
item.description: In every team I’ve been part of for the last few years we’ve always had a debate sooner or later if we should use a git merge or git rebase to keep a branch up-to-date with it’s source branch. This post sheds some light on the pros and cons of both and my opinion on what you should use for your team. Before I go on, let’s get on the same page what a few terms mean throughout this article:
